entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
